summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5478 for the improvement of Cleopatra Place, from West 70th Street to a point 40 feet north of the north line of Block 2, Peterson's Addition; by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 69708, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
